scripts.prepare: yarn run install-wasm-pack && husky install && cargo install cargo-watch && rustup toolchain install nightly && rustup component add rust-src --toolchain nightly-2022-12-12
scripts.dev:wasm-single-threaded: cd wasm && cargo watch -s 'rustup run nightly wasm-pack build . --target web'
scripts.dev:wasm-multi-threaded: cd wasm && RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals" rustup run nightly cargo watch -s'wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg-parallel -- --features parallel -Z build-std=panic_abort,std'
scripts.build:wasm-single-threaded: cd wasm && rustup run nightly wasm-pack build --target web --release
scripts.build:wasm-multi-threaded: cd wasm && RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals" rustup run nightly wasm-pack build --target web --release --out-dir pkg-parallel -- --features parallel -Z build-std=panic_abort,std
scripts.build: yarn run build:wasm && yarn run build:js
scripts.test: yarn run test:cypress && yarn run test:wasm
scripts.lint:wasm:check: cd wasm && RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals" rustup run nightly cargo clippy -- -D warnings
scripts.lint:wasm: cd wasm && RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals" rustup run nightly cargo clippy --fix
scripts.check: yarn run type:check && yarn run lint:js:check && yarn run format:check && yarn run lint:wasm:check
